manifest.name: iCal
manifest.description: Scans your vault for tasks. Creates an iCal file and stores it on Gist. You can then show this calendar in any iCal compatible client such as Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.
manifest.author: Andrew Brereton

data.manifestValue: Scans your vault for tasks. Creates an iCal file and stores it on Gist. You can then show this calendar in any iCal compatible client such as Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.
data.communityListValue: Scan your vault for tasks that contain dates. Create an iCalendar file and store it in your vault or on Gist. You can then show this calendar in any iCal-compatible client such as Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.
